control_attributes.Control: IA-5 (4) AUTOMATED SUPPORT  FOR PASSWORD STRENGTH DETERMINATION
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated tools to determine if password authenticators are sufficiently strong to satisfy [Assignment: organization-defined requirements].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system prohibits the use of cached authenticators after [Assignment: organization-defined time period].
